basics.name: Eddie Naff
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Web developer with extensive experience building NodeJS and PHP backed websites using, HTML5, CSS3 and various JavaScript frameworks.

highlights: Process all receiving & shipments
Manage facility management needs including maintenance, access, and security
Provision computer hardware for new employees
Developed an interior application to generate PowerPoint reports using JavaScript
Automated open-ended survey scoring by utilizing Elasticsearch for Natural Language Processing.
Automated translation and geocoding of international survey data for analysis using Google Translation and Places APIs
Updated existing Marketo landing pages to use a newly styled form to accommodate a recent design change using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

work.summary: Full-stack developer responsible for creation and maintenance of all web systems and materials
highlights: Sole designer for all print and web needs
Maintained deployment of ExpressionEngine, a PHP-based CMS and content management platform
Recorded, edited, and produced training, testimonial, and webinar videos for publication in multiple channels
Managed all SEO and web advertising company-wide
Designed internal APIs for systems integration (Marketo, Netsuite, eCommerce, company site)
Provided operations support to related business units by customizing Netsuite dashboards, designing reports, etc.

work.summary: Managed incoming lead data for qualification and distribution to sales. Also responsible for integrating web tools to assist with the above.
highlights: Data cleaning, data gathering in Salesforce and Marketo
Creation of NodeJS / Angular apps to replace the default SFDC interface for faster data input
Created internal competitor analysis engine using NodeJS, Mongo, and the CasperJS visual testing library

work.summary: Provided safety analysis services for the construction and maintenance of California’s courthouses.
highlights: Designed and implementated an in-house customization of the Facilities Management system by integrating Excel, Access, and JavaScript for faster info sharing
Created and managed the Asbestos Management Program and database for statewide asbestos compliance in California’s courthouses
Logged and tracked incidents involving injury and property damage in California courthouses for future
Managed OCIP insurance program to insure new courthouse construction projects
Created a digital asset management system using Mongo and Angular to speed up equipment intake and warehouse storage for all CPMC hospitals in San Francisco
Tracked and managed the medical equipment inventory for CPMC’s surgical training center
Instituted asset tagging system for faster equipment identification using open source barcoding and mobile cameras using Angular and Redis
Gathered data for long-term planning projects
Analyzed rider surveys on customer needs and requirements
Assisted in the development of new policies and procedures
Provided clerical support for the associate and senior transportation analysts
